entityPackage

Class LevelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • entityPackage.LevelState

  • public class LevelState
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all level information. This is the class that is shared between the game and the level builder. It allows us to save the Object as a file, and then load it into either the game or the level builder.
    Author:
    Dean Kiourtsis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LevelState()
      Creates a default LevelState object
      LevelState(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a LevelState using the name of an existing LevelState save file

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelState

        public LevelState(java.lang.String levelName,
                  int[][] boardVals,
                  int[][] marks,
                  int[][] multipliers,
                  boolean[][] blockedTiles,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  java.lang.String levelType,
                  int[] starScores,
                  int[] specialMoves,
                  int timeLimit,
                  int moveLimit,
                  int[] multiplierProbabilities,
                  int[] tileProbabilities,
                  boolean isUnlocked,
                  int highScore)
        Creates a LevelState object with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        levelName - the name of a level.
        boardVals - the tile values.
        marks - indicates whether the tile is marked.
        multipliers - the multiplier probabilities.
        blockedTiles - indicates whether a tile is blocked.
        width - the width of the board, in terms of number of tiles.
        height - the height of the board, in terms of the number of tiles.
        levelType - the level type (e.g. Puzzle, Lightning, etc.).
        starScores - the star milestone scores.
        specialMoves - the number of special moves allowed.
        timeLimit - the time limit permitted.
        moveLimit - the number of moves allowed.
        multiplierProbabilities - the probabilities for the multipliers.
        tileProbabilities - the probabilities for the tile numbers.
        isUnlocked - indicates whether the level is unlocked.
        highScore - the highest score attained for a level.

      • LevelState

        public LevelState()
        Creates a default LevelState object

      • LevelState

        public LevelState(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a LevelState using the name of an existing LevelState save file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file which is to be loaded by the LevelState
